kw.name: open the browser with OrangeDemo url
Create Webdriver
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Browser Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Select the link of the child window
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify the user is switched to child window
Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'css:h1' contains exact text 'DOCUMENTS REQUEST'.

kw.name: Grab the email id in the child window
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${text} = Please email us at mentor@rahulshettyacademy.com with below template to receive response

kw.name: Split String
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.
kw.msg: @{words} = [ Please email us | mentor@rahulshettyacademy.com with below templ | e to receive response ]

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Split String
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Get From List
kw.doc: Returns the value specified with an ``index`` from ``list``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Switch to Parent window to enter the email
Switch Window
kw.doc: Switches to browser window matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.
kw.msg: Page title is 'LoginPage Practise | Rahul Shetty Academy'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text ' mentor@rahulshettyacademy.com ' into text field 'id:username'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
